subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Dwight Howard finished with 29 points and 17 rebounds, and the host Magic beat the Hawks to take a 2-0 lead in the teams’ Eastern Conference semifinal series.
snippet: Dwight Howard finished with 29 points and 17 rebounds, and the host Magic beat the Hawks to take a 2-0 lead in the teams’ Eastern Conference semifinal series.
